description.narrative: The project will aim to promote local economic development of the beneficiaries across Western and Greater Accra Regions in Ghana. The project aims to identify and groom young people and women to gain employable skills or be self-employed. The target population will be trained on; improved apprenticeships, International Institute of Welders (IIW) accreditation schemes, appropriate technology training programs, aquaculture and fish processing, improved agricultural practices, customer service training etc. The action will also build the capacity of MMDAs and tax officials to collect taxes and identify innovative opportunities for IGF as well as ensuring that they account to the citizens through platforms like the budget hearings.
